DOC.brief_title: Intervention Study Prevent Obesity Sedentary 8 Year Old Swedish Children
DOC.detailed_description: Background Between 3 5 % Swedish 10 yr old obese additional 20 % over-weight . Being physically inactive childhood increase risk become obese child- adulthood correlation BMI arterial-sclerotic marker see already childhood . Physical activity ( PA ) child improve insulin sensitivity reduce metabolic risk regardless proportion fat mass . Published questionnaire data suggest level PA decrease child year 1968 2001 . Study aim To study whether target intervention increase PA sedentary 8-yr old child ( 2nd grade Swedish elementary school ) affect secondary measure ; metabolic- cardiovascular risk marker ; self-reported quality life , PA motor skill ; BMI ; body composition ; bone mineral density ( BMD ) ; PF . To identify factor success could implement school pre-schools commune health-care parent support . Subjects method With informed write consent parents/caretakers screen select school questionnaires accelerometer identify sedentary child . The 30 % inactive child offer participation study . Cut value inactivity obtain large reference-material base 1800 measurement 6 - 10 yr old child STOPP study . The intervention deliver session aim develop healthy habit regard PA via supplementation fish liver oil . The session perform trained health worker ( coach ) carry family ' home later via telephone . All family meet coach least 6 time . The coach use technique Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) . However , extra effort , group work-out session out-door activity , make . The individual work family delicate intervention staff group therefore continuous education guidance qualify MI tutor . All include child randomize equally size intervention control group . All outcome measure assess 0 15 week ( completion ) intervention . The study limit school semester . Screening therefore schedule fall- intervention program spring semester .
